markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Untwisting Iron Buffer](/Spells.aspx?ID=546)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You send currents of protective ki to the surface of your body that protect you from harm, at least until your enemies dissipate them. You gain 15 temporary Hit Points, which last for up to 3 rounds.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The temporary Hit Points increase by 5.
name: Untwisting Iron Buffer

text: Untwisting Iron Buffer Source World Guide pg. 83 2.0 Cast Single Action verbal --- You send currents of protective ki to the surface of your body that protect you from harm, at least until your enemies dissipate them. You gain 15 temporary Hit Points, which last for up to 3 rounds. --- Heightened (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 5.
